post:
Hello.

I'm working on Project Free SA-MP Hosting.

I'm working with my team from September to keep project get better and better.

From last 2 Months we have Issues with OPG (Open Game Panel) so we decide to Code our Own Game Panel and we Named it HotFox.

We Update our hosting same as we change our name and Domain from ModernCenter freesa-mp.com to GalaxyHostFree galaxyhostfree.com  We have made news system 
Host for Post. why?  because lots of registration was fake and waste of our time
so now everyone need to register and keep post 20 Posts per Month. 
 When you order your server your don't need have 20 Posts at start all you need is forum account which can be made at http://forum.galaxyhostfree.com
We Provide free Sa-mp server with 35 slots we currently have 2 locations UK and USA soon we will add
Locations like Germany , Brasil , Africa and we may add locations in Asia.

So why choose us?  we are doing our best to help people develope or just have their server Online while they don't have money for Expensive hosts which wont worth your money and time. also we have great support on forum which will help you with any issue related to Server issue.  so why not try us? We have great reviews of our hosting and Stable servers.  some of users says it better then hosting them self on own server :)

So 3 easy steps

1. Register at forum http://forum.galaxyhostfree.com

2. Order your free Server http://galaxyhostfree.com   Note username most be same like in forum

3. Post 20 Posts on forum every month Dedline date is 25 of each month no spamming posts or thread for post count.


if you have any questions fell free to ask us or e-mail me on mlody.1039@galaxyhostfree.com


Best regards
mlody.1039
President Of GalaxyHostFree
